title: Removing some axiom requirements and disjoint variable conditions

blocks.name: bj-exlimvmpi
blocks.content: A Fol lemma ( ~ exlimiv followed by ~ mpi ). (Contributed by BJ, 2-Jul-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-exlimmpi
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 (an instance of this lemma is a version of ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 where ` x ` and ` y ` are identified). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-exlimmpbi
blocks.content: Lemma for theorems of the ~ vtoclg family. (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-exlimmpbir
blocks.content: Lemma for theorems of the ~ vtoclg family. (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-vtoclf
blocks.content: Remove dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab and ~ df-cleq (and ~ df-sb and ~ df-v ) from ~ vtoclf . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-vtoclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- w0
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wcel(c0, c1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w1
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, w1)
  19.36i(s0, w1, w0)
  eximii(s0, wi(w1, w0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  bj-issetiv(s0, c0, c1)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-vtoclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ w0
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà c1
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ w1
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, w1)
  19.36i(s0, w1, w0)
  eximii(s0, (w1 ‚Üí w0), s0 = c0)
  bj-issetiv(s0, c0, c1)
  biimpd(s0 = c0, w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: bj-vtocl
blocks.content: Remove dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab and ~ df-cleq (and ~ df-sb and ~ df-v ) from ~ vtocl . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-vtoclg1f1
blocks.content: The FOL content of ~ vtoclg1f (hence not using ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ). Note the weakened "major" hypothesis and the disjoint variable condition between ` x ` and ` A ` (needed since the nonfreeness quantifier for classes is not available without ~ ax-ext ; as a byproduct, this dispenses with ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 ). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-vtoclg1f
blocks.content: Reprove ~ vtoclg1f from ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 . This removes dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq and ~ df-v . Use ~ bj-vtoclg1fv instead when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-vtoclg1fv
blocks.content: Version of ~ bj-vtoclg1f with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , V ` . This removes dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab . Prefer its use over ~ bj-vtoclg1f when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-vtoclg
blocks.content: A version of ~ vtoclg with an additional disjoint variable condition (which is removable if we allow use of ~ df-clab , see ~ bj-vtoclg1f ), which requires fewer axioms (i.e., removes dependency on ~ ax-6 , ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-9 , ~ ax-12 , ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-v ). (Contributed by BJ, 2-Jul-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-rabbida2
blocks.content: Version of ~ rabbidva2 with disjoint variable condition replaced by nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabbida
blocks.content: Version of ~ rabbidva with disjoint variable condition replaced by nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabbid
blocks.content: Version of ~ rabbidv with disjoint variable condition replaced by nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabeqd
blocks.content: Deduction form of ~ rabeq . Note that contrary to ~ rabeq it has no disjoint variable condition. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabeqbid
blocks.content: Version of ~ rabeqbidv with two disjoint variable conditions removed and the third replaced by a nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabeqbida
blocks.content: Version of ~ rabeqbidva with two disjoint variable conditions removed and the third replaced by a nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-seex
blocks.content: Version of ~ seex with a disjoint variable condition replaced by a nonfreeness hypothesis (for the sake of illustration). (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-seex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wse(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylanb(wse(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), universe)))
  df-se(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  rspccva(hs0, c1, c2, wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), universe), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), universe, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  bj-rabbid(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-seex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Se]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]c2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylanb(c0[Se]c1, c2 ‚àà c1, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]c2 } ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]hs0 } ‚àà ùïå))
  df-se(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  rspccva(hs0, c1, c2, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]hs0 } ‚àà ùïå, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]c2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  eleq1d({ s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]hs0 }, universe, { s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]c2 }, hs0 = c2)
  bj-rabbid(s0, c1, hs0 = c2, s0[c0]hs0, s0[c0]c2)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  breq2(hs0, c2, s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 ‚àà c1 | s0[c0]c2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-nfcf
blocks.content: Version of ~ df-nfc with a disjoint variable condition replaced with a nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-nfcf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  bitri(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  bitri(wal(hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(s1, wsb(s1, hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  sb8(hs0, s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nfnf(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  albii(s1, wsb(s1, hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  bitri(wsb(s1, hs0, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  bj-sbnf(s1, hs0, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfbii(s0, wsb(s1, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  clelsb3(s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-nfcf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (F/(s0, c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1, F/(s0, s1 ‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  bitri(F/(s0, c0), ‚àÄ(s1, F/(s0, s1 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  df-nfc(s0, hs0, c0)
  bitri(‚àÄ(hs0, F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s1, F/(s0, s1 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s1,[s1 / hs0]F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  sb8(hs0, s1, F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0))
  nfnf(s1, s0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  albii(s1, [s1 / hs0]F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0), F/(s0, s1 ‚àà c0))
  bitri([s1 / hs0]F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0), F/(s0, s1 ‚àà c0), F/(s0,[s1 / hs0]hs0 ‚àà c0))
  bj-sbnf(s1, hs0, s0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  nfbii(s0, [s1 / hs0]hs0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0)
  clelsb3(s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-axsep2
blocks.content: Remove dependency on ~ ax-12 and ~ ax-13 from ~ axsep2 while shortening its proof. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-axsep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bj-chvarvv(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elequ2(hs0, s2, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-axsep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  bj-chvarvv(hs0, s2, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)))))
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = s2, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  albidv(s1, hs0 = s2, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))
  bibi2d(hs0 = s2, s1 ‚àà s0, (s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = s2, s1 ‚àà hs0, w0, s1 ‚àà s2)
  elequ2(hs0, s2, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: bj-zfauscl
blocks.content: General version of ~ zfauscl , removing dependency on ~ ax-12 and ~ df-clab (and ~ df-tru , ~ df-sb , ~ df-v ). Remark: the comment in ~ zfauscl is misleading: the essential use of ~ ax-ext is the one via ~ eleq2 and not the one via ~ vtocl , since the latter can be proved without ~ ax-ext (see ~ bj-vtoclg ). (Contributed by BJ, 2-Jul-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-zfauscl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bj-vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  eximdv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  alimdv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-zfauscl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  bj-vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)))))
  eximdv(s0, hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))))
  alimdv(s1, hs0 = c0, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))
  biimpd(hs0 = c0, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))
  bibi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà s0, (s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà hs0, w0, s1 ‚àà c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
